Moonbeam.name: Moonbeam
Moonbeam.flavor: A ray of frosty light streaks from your bow to slow the limbs of your prey.
Moonbeam.requirement: You must be wielding a longbow or a shortbow.
Moonbeam.onHit: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier cold damage. Until the end of your next turn, the target grants combat advantage to anyone that makes a ranged attack against it.

Shroud of Stars.name: Shroud of Stars
Shroud of Stars.flavor: Myriad specks of light swirl about you, hiding you from enemies.
Shroud of Stars.effect: Until the stance ends, whenever you shift, you gain concealment until the start of your next turn.

Seldarine Wrath.name: Seldarine Wrath
Seldarine Wrath.flavor: You launch a fiery bolt from your bow that erupts into white-hot flame where it hits.
Seldarine Wrath.requirement: You must be wielding a longbow or a shortbow.
Seldarine Wrath.onHit: 3d10 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and the target takes ongoing 10 fire damage and is dazed (save ends both).
Seldarine Wrath.onMiss: Half damage, and ongoing 10 fire damage (save ends).
